attributes.action: Stop the deportation of Altin Kica
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My husband is facing possible deportation once he finishes his prison sentence.  He was convicted of a minor non violent and non sexual crime and faces deportation taking him away from me and our one year old little boy.  Please sign this petition to stop this deportation as my husband is a hard worker and has made one silly mistake he regrets. He has never been in any trouble before.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
